workExperience.description: Worked in a agile environment and developed test suit for faster and reliable project deployment.
projects: Developed and maintained a Python based Playwright test suit for a seperated company project.
Developed and maintained a BDD style JAVA test suit for the main production website.
Developed a asset cloning tool which helps to clone assets from production environment to development environment which makes it eaiser for the devs and QA to check things on QA environment.
